Description.Details: The Gallant was given a variety of weapons to fight at all ranges. The turret carried a heavy Kali Yama Class 10 autocannon with two tons of ammunition, accompanied by a Harvester SRM-2 rack with 50 reloads and four Scatter Gun machine guns for use against infantry. A Light Crossbow LRM-10 launcher mounted in the front and with 1 ton of ammo allowed for long-range fire and indirect missile attacks.
